text: I said of him, Judge, what you will, but I know the failings of my son. If I love him it is not because he is good, but because he is my son. What do you know of the tenderness that can inspire you, you who are trying to make an exact inventory of your qualities and your shortcomings? When I have to punish him, it becomes my own flesh. When I do cry, my heart cries with him. Only I can accuse him and punish him, for only the father has the right to punish. FIN
title: El juez
author: Rabindranath Tagore
